instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00281 still 5v after all USB-C where changed
threads.message:
This board is showing 5.2V on the charger. The USB C Controllers have already been replaced and the issue persits. 

What do you check/how do you find the responsible port? And what could be some more possible causes?

threads.title: 820-00281 still 5v after all USB-C where changed
threads.message:
Any history available?
Did replace the CD3215 with exact same termination?
C00 and B03 are not compatible, for example...

threads.title: 820-00281 still 5v after all USB-C where changed
threads.message: What voltage do you get on PP3v3_G3H? And yes, hopefully, you replaced with the same firmware C00 or B03...

threads.title: 820-00281 still 5v after all USB-C where changed
820-00281 still 5v after all USB-C where changed
threads.message: There is your problem you will NOT get 20 volts without PP3v3 it has to be present. Resistance to ground on that line?

threads.title: 820-00281 still 5v after all USB-C where changed
threads.message:
Do you get 5V at R7020?
If not, post diode mode (red probe at ground) at R7020 and F7000.

threads.title: 820-00281 still 5v after all USB-C where changed
threads.message: PP3v3_G3H is shorted.. The SMC is the problem... should we try to recplace it, or not

threads.title: 820-00281 still 5v after all USB-C where changed
threads.message: Is the SMC definitely the short? If so, replacing it should fix the issue

threads.title: 820-00281 still 5v after all USB-C where changed
threads.message:
If short is gone when remove the SMC, change it.
Remember to use one from same 00281 donor board...

threads.title: 820-00281 still 5v after all USB-C where changed
threads.message: Now, we changed the SMC and the short is gone. Still 5v on the charger tho.. I noticed that all ports except one draws about 150mA. Only one is drawing just 11mA. Does that tell us somethng ? or is it irrelevant

threads.title: 820-00281 still 5v after all USB-C where changed
